title: TikTok in prison
description:
What ‘prison TikTok’ tells us about the lives of incarcerated people.

Featuring:
Louise Matsakis -- Staff Writer at WIRED (@lmatsakis)
Nazgol Ghandnoosh -- Senior Research Analyst at The Sentencing Project (@NazgolG)
Adnan Khan -- Executive Director at Re:Store Justice (@akhan1437)

Links to resources:
Behind Bars, but Still Posting on TikTok

The Sentencing Project

Re:Store Justice

Host:
Arielle Duhaime-Ross (@adrs), host and lead reporter of Reset

About Recode by Vox:
Recode by Vox helps you understand how tech is changing the world — and changing us.
